languages.text: На всякую проблему Человечество имеет инструмент, дарованный Омниссией. Его священные дары облечены плотью станков и механизмов, запчастей и аугментаций, приборов и транспортных средств — неисчислимы формы, которые способно принять Познание.

For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.
languages.original_text: На всякую проблему Человечество имеет инструмент, дарованный Омниссией. Его священные дары облечены плотью станков и механизмов, запчастей и аугментаций, приборов и транспортных средств — неисчислимы формы, которые способно принять Познание.

traits.locale_text: For every problem Humanity faces, it has a tool granted by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are dressed in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

For every problem Humanity faces, it has a tool granted by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are dressed in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

languages.text: Para cada problema al que se enfrenta la Humanidad, el Omnissiah le da una herramienta. Sus sagrados dones están en la carne de los tornos y los mecanismos, de las piezas y los auméticos, de los dispositivos y de los medios de transporte: el conocimiento puede adoptar un sinfín de formas.
languages.original_text: For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

traits.locale_text: Para cada problema al que se enfrenta la Humanidad, el Omnissiah le da una herramienta. Sus sagrados dones están en la carne de los tornos y los mecanismos, de las piezas y los auméticos, de los dispositivos y de los medios de transporte: el conocimiento puede adoptar un sinfín de formas.

languages.text: Quel que soit le défi auquel l'humanité doit faire face, l'Omnimessie lui procure l'outil lui permettant de le surmonter. Ses bénédictions sacrées peuvent prendre la forme du tour de l'artisan ou d'un mécanisme, de pièces détachées ou d'augmétiques, d'appareils ou de modes de transport... La connaissance possède une infinité de visages.
languages.original_text: For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

traits.locale_text: Quel que soit le défi auquel l'humanité doit faire face, l'Omnimessie lui procure l'outil lui permettant de le surmonter. Ses bénédictions sacrées peuvent prendre la forme du tour de l'artisan ou d'un mécanisme, de pièces détachées ou d'augmétiques, d'appareils ou de modes de transport... La connaissance possède une infinité de visages.

languages.text: 人类面临的每一道难题，欧姆尼塞亚都赐下了解谜的工具。车床和机械装置、备件和植入物、设备和运输方式——知识的形式无穷无尽，都是欧姆尼塞亚慷慨的馈赠。
languages.original_text: For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

traits.locale_text: 人类面临的每一道难题，欧姆尼塞亚都赐下了解谜的工具。车床和机械装置、备件和植入物、设备和运输方式——知识的形式无穷无尽，都是欧姆尼塞亚慷慨的馈赠。

languages.text: 人類が直面するあらゆる問題に対して、万機神から授けられた道具。その聖なる贈り物は、旋盤やメカニズム、スペアパーツやオーグメティック、装置や輸送手段など…知識が取り得る形は無数にあるのだ。
languages.original_text: For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

traits.locale_text: 人類が直面するあらゆる問題に対して、万機神から授けられた道具。その聖なる贈り物は、旋盤やメカニズム、スペアパーツやオーグメティック、装置や輸送手段など…知識が取り得る形は無数にあるのだ。

languages.text: Für jedes Problem, vor dem die Menschheit steht, hat der Omnissiah ihr ein Werkzeug gegeben. Seine heiligen Gaben liegen im Fleisch von Drehbänken und Mechanismen, von Ersatzteilen und Augmentationen, von Geräten und Fortbewegungsmitteln — das Wissen kann unzählige verschiedene Formen annehmen.
languages.original_text: For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.

traits.locale_text: Für jedes Problem, vor dem die Menschheit steht, hat der Omnissiah ihr ein Werkzeug gegeben. Seine heiligen Gaben liegen im Fleisch von Drehbänken und Mechanismen, von Ersatzteilen und Augmentationen, von Geräten und Fortbewegungsmitteln — das Wissen kann unzählige verschiedene Formen annehmen.

languages.text: İnsanlığın karşılaştığı her sorun için, Hermesih tarafından bahşedilmiş bir alet bulunur. Kutsal armağanları; torna tezgâhı ve mekanizmalar, yedek parça ve ogmetikler, cihaz ve nakliye sistemleri şeklinde kendilerini gösterir. İrfan'ın alabileceği biçimler sayısızdır.
languages.original_text: For every problem Humankind faces, it has a tool granted it by the Omnissiah. His sacred gifts are vested in the flesh of lathes and mechanisms, spare parts and augmetics, devices and modes of transport — the forms that Knowledge can take are innumerable.
